channel.title: kotlin on I Prefer Jim
channel.description: Recent content in kotlin on I Prefer Jim

item.title: iggy: ignore file processor for jvm
item.description: As a core team member for Swagger Codegen, one of the major features I’ve added in the last year was support for .

item.title: Prototyping a Flags/Bitmasks implementation in Kotlin 1.1.1
item.description: One of my more favorite features of C# is the use of FlagsAttribute. If you’re not familiar with the concept, [Flags] allows you to treat an integral enum type as a bitmask.
